name: McDonald's
description: Classic, long-running fast-food chain known for its burgers & fries.
address: McDonald's, 5776 Ladner Trunk Rd, Ladner, BC V4K 1X6

featured_reviews.review_id:
Good food. But very bad customer service. There are around 7-10 staff where, nobody will even look at you if standing near the receiving counter for a minimum of 2-3 minutes.
And ordered 2 kids meals with toys of under 3 years and received this card game. I wonder how kids under 3 years can play with this.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
I gave a very negative review regarding the quality of the food, the level of customer service at this location about one year ago.

It was warranted.  It was terrible.

For the past 2 months I've been coming back here late at night, everything has changed.   They tell you to wait a few mins for your order but that's because they are cooking it fresher for you.

Even though it seems they are still understaffed at times, the STAFF is putting in the effort to make each and every order the way it should be.  Fresh, hot and with a smile.

Dear owner and managers, I know margins are very low right now but please try to do your best to have enough staff on to help them do their jobs better and also happier.

Keep up the good work and thanks for doing a great job serving your local community!

featured_reviews.review_id: Outdoor seating is super nice on a sunny day. The self ordering kiosks were all off when I visited.
featured_reviews.review_text: Outdoor seating is super nice on a sunny day. The self ordering kiosks were all off when I visited.

featured_reviews.review_id: Tables are all dirty in the kids play area yet no one's in there  , they change extra for any sauce , I spent 50$ and had ordered 20 nuggets and got 2 sauces and they wanted to charge me more for extra after I ordered . Drinks aren't filled up all the way and over filled with ice. I got 6 sips out of my medium pop . The my have a new owner that made the change and charges us for sauce that should be included . I do not recommend this location .

featured_reviews.review_id:
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!

They charge 25 cents for a paper bag knowing that no one would refuse it. Who wants to have their fries etc passed to the car? That's ridiculous and not food safe. Also a joke because it's not like you can pass them a reusable bag through the window. Again, not food safe!

Now about the food. We ordered 20 chicken nuggets - I have never had such old, chewy nuggets (and could not eat them...). The fries were brown because they were over cooked and stale. The only good thing was the pop but I doubt the machine gets cleaned seeing how little care was put into everything else.

featured_reviews.review_id: I ordered some items on the mobile application today and they messed up my sandwich. Also, the large fries have been consistently underfilled every time I've gone here.  The solution for my sandwich that I was presented with was nothing less than insulting. If I wanted to assemble my burger, I'd host a BBQ. Throroughly disappointed. Especially with the idea that I would have been ripped off if I didn't check my order before leaving.

featured_reviews.review_id:
4 coffees and all of them missing sugars. Thought it was a mistake and the same thing happens for the following 2 days.

Edit on Dec 28, 2021: Still no improvements. My coffee missed sugars and my breakfast sandwich didn't have any cheese.. If it wasn't of the location or coupons, I would not use this McDonalds. Don't take me wrong, I love McDonald's. In fact, I spend hundreds a month at different locations of McDonald's, and I try my best to avoid this location but sometimes it is what it is. And each time I order at this specific location, I end up in disappointment. After the braekfast incident today, I "accidentally" ordered at this location while using the app for my dinner. (I'd drive to Wal-Mart in Twassen to pick up if they are open and have done numerous times) My large fries were half filled, burger doesn't have any ketchups, and my sszechuan burger didn't have any sauce. I prayed that I was dreaming. Because, the only reason I ordered that chicken burger was to try out the new sauce which is even advertised as a "featured item" on the app. I'd love to have a full refund and drive to Twassen to get my proper McDonald's order, which I do not have a high expection to, but what you guys are doing at the Ladner location is, absolutely ridiculous. I really hope this review gets some kind of attention from the employees to make some improvements. If these employees can't even follow the simple guidelines engineered by the headquarter to make burgers in the simplest way in the world, then they probably won't end up anywhere in this world.

and would not leave a review unless I feel like this unacceptable.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Took over 10 mins to get our food, person at the drivethru window yelled at us (I.e. my 11 year old special needs child) to be faster and all employees were rude, except the guy bringing food outside.

Whoever is managing this place might need some training.

P.s. I didn't realize Pepper was such an important ingredient in my 11 year olds big Mac. See pic.
